dialogue.system: Let's play the blackjack game. game rule: 1. Please try to get your card total to as close to 21 as possible, without going over, and still having a higher total than the dealer. 2. If you choose to Stand, you will stop taking cards and wait for the dealer to finish. If you choose to Hit, you can continue to take a card, but there is also the risk of losing the game over 21 points. 4. After all players have completed their hands, the dealer reveals their hidden card. Dealers must hit until their cards total 17 or higher.

If you choose to Stand, you will stop taking cards and wait for the dealer to finish. If you choose to Hit, you can continue to take a card, but there is also the risk of losing the game over 21 points. 4. After all players have completed their hands, the dealer reveals their hidden card. Dealers must hit until their cards total 17 or higher.

If you choose to Stand, you will stop taking cards and wait for the dealer to finish. If you choose to Hit, you can continue to take a card, but there is also the risk of losing the game over 21 points. 4. After all players have completed their hands, the dealer reveals their hidden card. Dealers must hit until their cards total 17 or higher.
